segments.text: What do you do in your free time , Nancy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I like playing the violin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? How long have you been playing the violin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About ten years so far . I started learning when I was in middle school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . So what about you ? Do you have any hobbies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I like collecting matchbox ! I'm not sure if that counts , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course it does . Everybody has his own hobby .
segments.speaker: S2
